title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Roundwood Removals Survey)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Roundwood Removals Survey) 

Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (roundwood removal survey) order 2025

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: In this Order –
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order – 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) No. 691/2011 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 6 July 20111, as amended by Regulation (EU) No. 
538/2014 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 April 20142, 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/125 of 19 November 20213 and 
Regulation (EU) 2024/3024 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 
27 November 20244; 

“removals”, in relation to roundwood, means the removal of roundwood 
following storm damage or any form of harvesting, including thinning; 

“standing timber value”, in relation to roundwood, means the value (excluding 
value-added tax) of roundwood removed from a forest before the adjustment of 
such value to account for the costs associated with the removal of the roundwood 
concerned; 

“survey” means the Roundwood Removals Survey that is conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information specified in 
the Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation.

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under section A, B, C, D, F, G, M, N or R of NACE Rev. 2.1 set out in 
Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 20 December 20065, as amended by Regulation (EC) No.

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide,
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, 
for the purposes of the survey and once only in respect of each such year, 
information the general nature of which is specified in the Schedule in relation 
to each of the years 2024, 2025, 2026, 2027 and 2028 is hereby prescribed. 

6 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13. 
7 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1. 
8 OJ No. L. 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241. 
9 OJ No. L. 19, 20.1.2023, p. 5. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [49]

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: Article 4

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the business activity
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the business activity 
of the undertaking concerned, and specifying the year to which the information 
relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

the quantity of coniferous roundwood removals from privatelyowned forests in the State by or on behalf of the undertaking; 

the quantity of non-coniferous roundwood removals from 
privately-owned forests in the State by or on behalf of the 
undertaking; 

(c) 

the standing timber value of the roundwood referred to in 
subparagraphs (a) and (b).

MICHEÁL MARTIN,
